hotels.name: Hotel Roc Varadero
hotels.desc: Hotel Roc Varadero is a luxurious hotel located in the heart of the city. It offers elegant rooms, exceptional dining options, and top-notch amenities.

hotels.name: Sol Varadero Beach
hotels.desc: Sol Varadero Beach is a modern hotel situated near the beach. It provides comfortable accommodations, delicious cuisine, and a range of recreational facilities.

hotels.name: Sol Caribe Beach
hotels.desc: Sol Caribe Beach offers a unique blend of history and luxury. With its stunning architecture, spacious rooms, and exceptional service, it's an ideal choice for discerning travelers.

hotels.name: Sanctuary At Grand Memories Varadero
hotels.desc: Sanctuary At Grand Memories Varadero offers breathtaking views of the surrounding mountains. It boasts comfortable rooms, a rooftop restaurant, and a rejuvenating spa.

hotels.name: Iberostar Selection Varadero
hotels.desc: Iberostar Selection Varadero is a charming boutique hotel with a cozy ambiance. It offers personalized service, stylish rooms, and a delightful garden cafe.
